pages.text: MIMI also includes a common configuration file with several additional settings that apply to both the client and server.$(br2)Like other mods, the configuration file for MIMI can be found in your Minecraft instance $(#0046ff)config$() folder and can be modified with any text editor or IDE.

pages.title: Music Cache Size
pages.text: $(l)Param:$() serverMusicCacheSize$(br)$(l)Type:$() Integer$(br)$(l)Default:$() 100$(br2)This parameter stores the number of MIDI files that the server should cache on disk from Floppy Disks.$(br2)Caching Floppy Disk midi files significantly increases performance but also requires some disk space (likely not a ton though, MIDI files are small).

pages.title: Allow Web MIDI
pages.text: $(l)Param:$() allowWebMidi$(br)$(l)Type:$() Boolean$(br)$(l)Default:$() true$(br2)This parameter stores whether or not the server should allow playing MIDI files from Floppy Disks that point to web sites.$(br2)Disabling this means all websites are disallowed regardless of the allowed hosts value.

pages.title: Allowed MIDI Hosts
pages.text: $(l)Param:$() allowedMusicHosts$(br)$(l)Type:$() Host List$(br)$(l)Default:$() Blank$(br2)This parameter stores a comma-separated list of websites hosts (Ex: $(o)google.com,example.com$()) that Floppy Disks can play MIDI files from. A blank list allows all sites.$(br2)Files are downloaded to the server from the URL and cached in the cache config directory.

pages.title: Allow Web Commands
pages.text: $(l)Param:$() allowWebCommands$(br)$(l)Type:$() Boolean$(br)$(l)Default:$() true$(br2)This parameter stores whether or not the server should allow the above web MIDI settings to be modified via in-game commands by players with 'op' privileges.

pages.title: Allow Music Commands
pages.text: $(l)Param:$() allowServerCommands$(br)$(l)Type:$() Boolean$(br)$(l)Default:$() true$(br2)This parameter stores whether or not the server should allow the list of server-provided MIDI Files to be modified via in-game commands by players with 'op' privileges.
